snippet.title: Scream 7 Featurette - Kevin Williamson on Directing Scream 7 (2026)
snippet.description:
Check out an Official Scream 7 Behind the Scenes Featurette starring Neve Campbell!

► Buy Tickets on Fandango: https://www.fandango.com/scream-7-2026-243198/movie-overview?cmp=Trailers_YouTube_Desc

Subscribe to the channel and click the bell icon to be notified of all the hottest trailers: http://bit.ly/2CNniBy
       
US Release Date: February 27, 2026
Starring: Anna Camp, Courteney Cox, Isabel May, Matthew Lillard, Mckenna Grace, Neve Campbell
Director: Kevin Williamson
Synopsis: When a new Ghostface killer emerges in the quiet town where Sidney Prescott (Neve Campbell) has built a new life, her darkest fears are realized as her daughter (Isabel May) becomes the next target. Determined to protect her family, Sidney must face the horrors of her past to put an end to the bloodshed once and for all.

► Learn more: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/scream_7?cmp=Trailers_YouTube_Desc

Watch More:
► Rotten Tomatoes Originals: http://bit.ly/2D3sipV
